item.description:
The Introduction to Meditation and Mysticism is a three part series that will introduce you to the fundamental practices of mysticism as well as the spiritual realities of the mystical life.  Join us for this free, three part series and begin or enhance your meditation and prayer practices to deepen your relationship with the Inner Divine.  This series is offered at the Ruach Center in Framingham, a school for meditation and mysticism.  Find out more at www.ruachcenter.org

For more information or to register for this series, please call Rev Mary Francis at 6179907411.
item.how_to_find_us: Edgell Road is off Rte 9 in Framingham. The exit is after Wholefoods and Staples. Bear right, right at lights onto Edgell then about 6 houses down on the right. Driveway is before the house.
item.name: Introduction to Meditation and Mysticism
